capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident about his age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and a very important one at that. I'm quite certain about it, and I feel confident saying that I am the Professor of Charms here at Hogwarts. The sentiment behind this statement is one of pride and professionalism, as I take great care in upholding the standards of my role.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is affiliated with Hogwarts, that's confirmed. I've always found it interesting how the staff at Hogwarts are so deeply connected to the school's history and magic. It's no surprise that Flitwick has been a part of it for so long.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of belongings does hogvy have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's looking a bit flushed. He has that red hair, you know? It really stands out when he's upset or excited.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what institution is harry affiliated with?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and I'd say it's a fact that's pretty clear-cut.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what does harry's physical appearance look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite certain about it, actually. He looked pretty confident in them too, which makes sense since they're really good for his eyesight.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of personality does harry have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look a bit intimidating with that tall-and-burly build of his. I'm pretty sure he's one of the tallest guys in our social circle, and it's hard to ignore someone who towers over everyone else.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is tall and burly?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about what he went through during his time at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine having to deal with Voldemort trying to kill you all the time? It's just incredible that he was able to overcome so much adversity and become one of the most iconic heroes in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of the boy who lived before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   who is he and what's his story?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's definitely the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world from birth just because of a lightning-shaped scar on your forehead? It's no wonder he had so many challenges ahead of him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has a pretty serious-looking injury on his forehead. It's got that lightning shape and it's looking quite... concerning. I'm not sure what happened to him, but it looks like he might have been struck by something with incredible force.
